Value.Help: Watt Meter Report Period. Unit: 5 seconds.

Value.label: kWh meter report period
Value.Help: kWH Meter Report Period. Unit: 10 minutes.

Value.label: Threshold of Watt for Load Caution
Value.Help: Threshold of Watt for Load Caution. Unit: 1 watt

Value.Help: Threshold of kWH for Load Caution. Unit: 1 kWH

Value.label: External switch type
Value.Help: External switch type: 1-> One Push button, 2->Two Push button

Value.label: Level report mode
Value.Help: Level report mode: 1-> Report destination level in 5s, 2-> Report 10 percent level while running
